channel.title: Help How to change npc drops!
channel.description:
Hey guys i have a problem with my rsps i dont know how to change the npc drops and rate plzz help me here are some screenshots so you can see what my npcdrops.cfg looks like.
[img]http://i1361.photobucket.com/albums/r661/PartyGanG/th_Untitled_zps29c332ab.png[/img]

6203 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995 995

why are so many 995 added i dont get that?

item.title: Help How to change npc drops!
item.dc:creator: @Skrillex_Craft Skrillex_Craft
item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

[quote=“LeipeOma, post:18, topic:526480”]ok and how do i change the drop rate and amount?[/quote]A small tutorial:

lets take the drop of the man so like said above 1 = id of npc 995 = drop 100000000 = Amount

1 995 100000000 9 995 1624 3140 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1618 1249 565 1147 444 1623 1619 4125 995 1643 4105 1387 995 560 555 565 4099 3053 556 11732

if it isnt helpfull il try another method

Read full topic

item.description:
@Skrillex_Craft wrote:

ok wait

Let us take this

1 = man 995 = drop all the ids are as first like this

this is what it looks like all the 1st nrs are npc id’s all the nrs beond it are the drops

1 995 9 995 1624 3140 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 1249 1247 561 995 1617 1619 1213 554 554 554 554 554 554 554 1618 1249 565 1147 444 1623 1619 4125 995 1643 4105 1387 995 560 555 565 4099 3053 556 11732
